page.title: 18GIRLS BRIGADE
page.content: Girls Brigade,a club for girls aged five to fifteen.Our motto is Seek, Serve and Follow Christ.The aim is to become followers of the Lord Jesus Christ and through self control,reverence,and a sense of responsibility to find true enrichment of life.We meet every Thursday at Carey Baptist Church during school terms.On joining we are issued with a uniform .The explorers(five to sevens) wear red jumpers,black pinafores and black hats with red braid.The juniors,seniors and brigaders wear black blazers,black skirts,red or blue ties,white blouses,hats with either blue or red braid,white socks,black tights and black shoes.We enjoy a variety of things from cooking,first aid,dancing,acting and craftwork.Badges are earnt for work during the year and
